Hi! My name is Kim.



I'm a software engineer who is passionate about about web and mobile development.

I'm an avid learner with experience in client-side and server-side web development using AngularJS, Django, Flask, and Jekyll.

When I'm not coding, I'm either wandering around the city, cooking or just working on side projects.

I'm currently learning react-native and working on an iOS app called Where Is My Bus?.

Showcase


Django Hackathon Starter

In Spring 2015, I worked on a class project called the Django Hackathon Starter. The idea of this project is to help developers save time when developing Django applications using/choosing which API to use and figuring how to use OAuth authentication.
